name: Mortimer and the Riddles of the Medallion
name_original: Mortimer and the Riddles of the Medallion
description:
Mortimer and the Riddles of the Medallion is an educational arcade-puzzle game developed by LucasArts Entertainment. It came out on 01-01-1996. LucasArts Entertainment published the game.
You can play Mortimer and the Riddles of the Medallion on PC.
